flush.title: Flush
flush.description: A dropped curb which is level with the surrounding area.

lowered.title: Lowered
lowered.description: A dropped curb which can be used by wheelchair users, not higher than a few centimeters.

no.title: No
no.description: There is no curb present at this location.

raised.title: Raised
raised.description: A raised curb which can't easily be used by wheelchair users, higher than a few centimeters.

rolled.title: Rolled
rolled.description: A raised curb with a rounded edge which makes it easier to use for cars or bicycles, but not for wheelchairs.

yes.title: Yes
yes.description: Some sort of curb is present at this location, unknown whether it is raised, lowered, flush etc.
